head.supplied: Jany 13/63 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ The Committee of the Victorian Horticultural Improvement Society having fixed on Saturday the 7th of March for Holding a General Exhibition, I am desired to request that the Soci...

div.p: MS 12521 Victorian Horticultural Society, box 3401, p. 194, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

The Committee of the Victorian Horticultural Improvement Society having fixed on Saturday the 7th of March for Holding a General Exhibition, I am desired to request that the Society have the use of the Botanical Gardens on that day as usual.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be Sir

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
W. Somner Hon. Sec.
See M to W. Somner 24 January 1863 (in this edition as 63-01-24a).
